form.PN:
Kadar je beseda
overthrow
glagol, jo izgovarjamo
/*@*Uv@Tr*@*U/
, kadar je samostalnik, pa
/*@*Uv@Tr@U/
.

sense.def:
To overthrow a government or a leader
pomeni s silo odstraniti vlado ali političnega voditelja z oblasti.

seg.quote: He was arrested for attempting to overthrow the regime.

sense.def:
Kadar neka ideja, vrednota ali merilo
is overthrown
, ga nadomesti drugo.

seg.quote: Laws are openly violated, standards of behaviour are overthrown.
